channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Pivotal Application Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Pivotal Application Service

item.title: CVE-2018-11044|2024-09-16T21:02:31.767Z -- pivotal -- pivotal%20application%20service
item.description: Pivotal Apps Manager included in Pivotal Application Service, versions 2.2.x prior to 2.2.1 and 2.1.x prior to 2.1.8 and 2.0.x prior to 2.0.17 and 1.12.x prior to 1.12.26, does not escape all user-provided content when sending invitation emails. A malicious authenticated user can inject content into an invite to another user, exploiting the trust implied by the source of the email.

item.title: CVE-2019-3788|2024-09-16T22:02:12.371Z -- pivotal -- pivotal%20application%20service
item.description: Cloud Foundry UAA Release, versions prior to 71.0, allows clients to be configured with an insecure redirect uri. Given a UAA client was configured with a wildcard in the redirect uri's subdomain, a remote malicious unauthenticated user can craft a phishing link to get a UAA access code from the victim.
